body:
Comment 1: 
If you would like to debug this, the relevant code is in
src/cmd/dist/build.c (look for 'You need'). It only prints the message
about the PATH if the directory is not already in the path. I don't
know why it thinks the directory is already listed given what you
showed us.

The detail about 'The compiler is 6g' is no longer printed because the
go command makes it irrelevant. I will update the docs.
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
